name: nysda-playwright-ui-tests
description: UI Test Automation Framework using Playwright

scripts.test:single: rm -rf playwright && pnpm exec playwright test test1.spec.ts
scripts.test: rm -rf playwright && pnpm exec playwright test
scripts.test:debug: rm -rf playwright && pnpm exec playwright test --debug
scripts.test:ui: rm -rf playwright && pnpm exec playwright test --ui
scripts.test:ci: rm -rf playwright && UI_TEST_ENV=local CI=true pnpm exec playwright test --workers=4
scripts.test:dev: rm -rf playwright && UI_TEST_ENV=dev pnpm exec playwright test --workers=4
scripts.test:qa: rm -rf playwright && UI_TEST_ENV=qa pnpm exec playwright test --workers=4
scripts.test:stg: rm -rf playwright && UI_TEST_ENV=stg pnpm exec playwright test --workers=4
scripts.test:prod: rm -rf playwright && UI_TEST_ENV=prod pnpm exec playwright test --workers=4
scripts.test:dev:ui: rm -rf playwright && UI_TEST_ENV=dev pnpm exec playwright test --ui
scripts.test:qa:ui: rm -rf playwright && UI_TEST_ENV=qa pnpm exec playwright test --ui
scripts.test:stg:ui: rm -rf playwright && UI_TEST_ENV=stg pnpm exec playwright test --ui
scripts.test:prod:ui: rm -rf playwright && UI_TEST_ENV=prod pnpm exec playwright test --ui
scripts.testdev:record: rm -rf playwright && UI_TEST_ENV=dev pnpm exec playwright codegen
scripts.test:qa:record: rm -rf playwright && UI_TEST_ENV=qa pnpm exec playwright codegen
scripts.test:stg:record: rm -rf playwright && UI_TEST_ENV=stg pnpm exec playwright codegen
scripts.test:prod:record: rm -rf playwright && UI_TEST_ENV=prod pnpm exec playwright codegen
scripts.test:headed: rm -rf playwright && pnpm exec playwright test --headed
scripts.test:dev:headed: rm -rf playwright && UI_TEST_ENV=dev pnpm exec playwright test --headed
scripts.test:qa:headed: rm -rf playwright && UI_TEST_ENV=qa pnpm exec playwright test --headed
scripts.test:stg:headed: rm -rf playwright && UI_TEST_ENV=stg pnpm exec playwright test --headed
scripts.test:prod:headed: rm -rf playwright && UI_TEST_ENV=prod pnpm exec playwright test --headed

author: iaroslav proskurnia
